solution_line_template: When John gives his sister {fraction_given_to_sister} of his money, he parts with {fraction_given_to_sister}*{initial_money} = <<{fraction_given_to_sister}*{initial_money}={money_given_to_sister}>>{money_given_to_sister} dollars

When he buys groceries worth ${groceries_cost}, he remains with {money_after_giving_sister}-{groceries_cost} = <<{money_after_giving_sister}-{groceries_cost}={money_remaining}>>{money_remaining} dollars
